text: Nikolay Hristov may refer to: * Nikolay Hristov (footballer, born 1985), Bulgarian footballer for Belasitsa Petrich * Nikolay Hristov (footballer, born 1989), Bulgarian footballer for Lokomotiv Gorna Oryahovitsa ;See also * Nikola Hristov, Bulgarian footballer for Dunav Ruse
title: Nikolay Hristov
